value.title: Create serverless applications
value.excerpt: In this learning path, discover Azure Functions that create event-driven, compute-on-demand systems using server-side logic to build serverless architectures.

topItems.title: Choose the best Azure service to automate your business processes
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll discuss how to choose the appropriate Azure service to integrate and automate business processes.

topItems.title: Create serverless logic with Azure Functions
topItems.excerpt: Azure Functions allow you to host business logic that can be executed without managing or provisioning server infrastructure

topItems.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers
topItems.excerpt: This module demos some of the most common types of triggers for executing Azure Functions and how to configure them to execute your logic.

topItems.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll learn how to integrate your Azure Function with various data sources by using bindings.

value.title: Plan and manage your Azure costs
value.excerpt: Migration to the cloud presents new ways to think about your IT expenses. This module teaches you about the factors that influence cost and tools you can use to help estimate and manage your cloud spend.

value.title: AZ-104: Configure and manage virtual networks for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure key Azure network capabilities and prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to connect your local on-premises networks into Azure using virtual networks, VPN gateways, and Azure ExpressRoute.

topItems.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment
topItems.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to plan and implement an IP addressing scheme for virtual networks and virtual machines in Azure.

topItems.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering
topItems.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.

topItems.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
topItems.excerpt: Find out how Azure network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

value.title: Build great solutions with the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
value.excerpt: Learn how to design and build secure, scalable, high-performing solutions in Azure using the pillars of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework.

topItems.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
topItems.excerpt: Learn how using key principles throughout your cloud architecture can help you design and build a solid architectural foundation that you can continuously improve.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cost optimization pillar of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework to design a cloud-based architecture that is efficient, eliminates waste, and gives you full visibility into where your money is spent on cloud resources.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to adjust your capacity based on workload and how to optimize network performance, storage, and database performance.

value.excerpt: In this learning path, get acquainted with using Azure App Service to create and deploy your website without underlying servers, storage or network assets.

topItems.excerpt: Create a website in the programming language of your choice through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

topItems.title: Stage a web app deployment for testing and rollback by using App Service deployment slots
topItems.excerpt: Discover the benefits of creating deployment slots to streamline deployment and roll back a web app in Azure App Service.

topItems.excerpt: Explore how to create and deploy a containerized application by using Azure Kubernetes Service declarative manifest files.

value.title: Learn how Microsoft supports secure software development as part of a cybersecurity solution
value.excerpt: Secure software development means integrating security into each phase of your development lifecycle, from requirements analysis to maintenance. Microsoft provides many services that can help you develop more secure code and deploy a more secure application in the cloud. This learning path provides an overview of the services and offerings available to help you build secure software as part of a cybersecurity solution.The deadline for agencies to comply with NIST/CISA/OMB guidance on security measures for critical software (including applying practices of least privilege, network segmentation, and proper configuration), per section 4 of the Executive Order on Improving the Nation's Cybersecurity, is **August 10, 2021**. The deadline for agencies to comply with the guidance identifying practices that enhance the security of the software supply chain with respect to software procurement, also per section 4, is **March 8, 2022**.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Security
topItems.excerpt: Discover the tools that Azure provides to help you design a secure environment throughout your infrastructure, data, network, and applications.

topItems.title: Get started with Azure DevOps
topItems.excerpt: Explore Azure DevOps capabilities and get started setting up your own organization knowing what separates elite performers from low performers.

topItems.title: Introduction to GitHub
topItems.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

topItems.title: Maintain a secure repository by using GitHub best practices
topItems.excerpt: Learn best practices for building, hosting, and maintaining a secure repository on GitHub.

value.title: Choose the best tools to help organizations build better solutions
value.excerpt: Learn about Microsoft tools and services that help developers and operations engineers build modern solutions for the cloud and on-premises.

value.title: Control and organize Azure resources with Azure Resource Manager
value.excerpt: Use Azure Resource Manager to organize resources, enforce standards, and protect critical assets from deletion.

value.title: Is Azure Free Account really free? | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this video of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to use Microsoft Azure for free, for 12 months.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips  Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: http://azure.com/free

value.title: Introduction to Azure IoT
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of building IoT solutions with Azure IoT.

topItems.title: Enabling digital transformation
topItems.excerpt: Digital transformation is a wave of business innovation fueled by the explosion of technologydata, applications, and devices are everywhere. The cloud, artificial intelligence (AI), and the internet of things (IoT) give organizations new ways to make sense of information and generate insights to transform their business. Realizing the benefits of digital transformation requires business leaders to look beyond technology to reimagine existing business models and embrace a different way of bringing together people, data, and processes to create value for customers.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure IoT strategy and solutions
topItems.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure IoT, and describes Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure. This knowledge can help bring IoT to life for your organization and customers.

value.title: Protect identity and access with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: The **Identity and Access learning path** covers the latest identity and access technologies, tools for strengthening authentication, and guidance on identity protection within your organization. Microsoft access and identity technologies enable you to secure your organizations identity, whether it is on-premises or in the cloud, and empower your users to work securely from any location.
